newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: OPTIONS -- small caps in demand on Amsterdam EOE.
newsitem.headline: OPTIONS -- small caps in demand on Amsterdam EOE.

text.p: Activity on the Amsterdam options exchange turned back to normal levels on Wednesday.
Next to the usual volumes in the main Dutch blue chips, there was a relatively vivid interest in several smaller stocks.
Contracts in retail and services group Vendex changed hands in big numbers, with calls outnumbering puts by far, influenced by the bid on French BIS.
Calls in Internatio-Mueller and Getronics were in demand. Internatio Mueller shares themselves rose 2.00 guilders to 47.00 amid heavy trading, while Getronics was up 1.60 to 49.60.
